section.title: Purpose
section.p: Provides idioms and frameworks by which processes can pass requests and data to other running processes.

section.title: Architectural relationships
section.p: The APIs in this group are fundamental to Symbian platform programming. This is particularly so of the high-level classes in the Asynchronous Services API, which are provide the underlying structure of most Symbian platform applications.

section.title: Description
section.p: Functionality is provided by a number of APIs. Use them as follows:
Provides the idioms by which one process in Symbian platform can request services from another.
Provides the Symbian platform client/server framework, by which a program can offer services to multiple other programs.
Provides miscellaneous low-level services for notifying programs of environment changes and of thread deaths, and for putting simple messages on screen.
